title: PM Shehbaz congratulates Donald Trump for US election win
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 6 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday congratulated the president-elect of the United States of America Donald Trump on his “historic” victory for a second term.
“Congratulations to President-elect Donald Trump on his historic victory for a second term,” the prime minister wrote on his X timeline.
Prime Minister Shehbaz said that he looked forward to working closely with the incoming Administration to further strengthen and broaden the Pakistan-U.S. partnership.
